import React, { useState } from 'react' import InnerBanner from '../components/InnerBanner/InnerBanner' import Plywood from '../components/Products/Plywood' export default function Products() { const [tabs, setTabs] = useState('plywood') return (
setTabs('plywood')}>
Plywood
setTabs('doores')}>
Doores
setTabs('blockBoard')}>
Block board
setTabs('decorative')}>
Decorative veneers
{ tabs ==='plywood' && }
) }
